thread.section_title: MyIMEIUnlock.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MyIMEIUnlock.com | myimeiunlock.com
thread.title: Adam Bishop

author: Adam Bishop
title: Adam Bishop
text:
It's been 18 days and i only recieved a confirmation from Dalpay. Nowhere on that email does it mention an order ID, so i'm not sure how to track it, contact them or request a refund. Can anyone help?
MyIMEI saw my review, got in touch with me via email issued me a full refund and processed my unlock for free. Going to take another 2 weeks before my phone is unlocked. However hats off to them for the way they corrected the situation. Very pleased with the outcome even if in total it will have taken 2 months to do.
